name: The Present (IcarusDev)
description:
Merry Christmas! Here are some Presents!

A very Short Horror Game about receiving Presents on Christmas! However, the presents may not be pleasant...

Takes about 10 minutes to play, enjoy opening the presents! 

Game was made in 24 hours

Note: When you open the present, go back into the house

CONTROLS:

  • WASD - Move
  • LMB - Interact

Available for Windows, MacOS and playable on WEBSITES
